author: Arkeen Larisma
title: Msgr. Rudy Villanueva dies at 83
text: MONSIGNOR Rudy Villanueva, an icon in Cebuano church liturgical music, passed away at 11:30 p.m. Thursday, May 23, 2024. He was 83. Villanueva, who used the pen name Renato E. Madrid, had been an important part of the devotion to Saint Pedro Calungsod, being the composer of many devotional songs to him, including “Way Sukod man ang Pagmahal,” “By the Power of Your Giving,” and the “Gozos of Saint Pedro Calungsod.” His other notable songs are "Sugbuanon nga Simbahan," "Umari ka," "Espiritu Santo," and "Cebu, Cebu." Villanueva had also made significant contributions to both secular and religious literature, writing plays in both English and Cebuano. He was also a trained composer and conductor. He published five books of Cebuano music and recorded his compositions, demonstrating his dedication to Cebuano culture. His renowned liturgical works included choral compositions, Masses, and musical dramas. He had published “Southern Harvest” "Devil Wings" (1997) and "Mass for the Death of an Enemy" (2000). His collection "Southern Harvest" included award-winning stories originally published in the Philippines Free Press and Asian Leader. Villanueva's academic background is equally impressive. He studied Philosophy and Theology at San Carlos Seminary in Cebu, literature at the University of Santo Tomas, and Music Composition at Mankato State University in Minnesota. In his younger years, Villanueva was on the staff at San Carlos Seminary in Cebu and taught at St. Joseph Seminary and Silliman University Music School in Dumaguete, which highlighted his commitment to education and mentorship in both religious and artistic fields. In 2022, the Cebu City Government awarded Villanueva the Order of Rajah Humabon Award for his outstanding achievement in the arts, music, and literature. (AML)

author: Mirage News
title: NZ Police Arrest More Suspects in Helensville Murder Case | Mirage News
text: Waitematā Police have today charged a further three men in relation to the death of Samuel Curle in Helensville in November 2023. Police initially charged two men in December 2023 with murder and both are due to reappear in the Auckland High Court in September 2025. Acting Detective Inspector Tim Williams, Waitematā CIB, says Police conducted a series of search warrants in both Waitematā and Canterbury districts early on Friday morning and located three people of interest in the investigation. "Two men, aged 17 and 62, were located at an address in Massey and were arrested without incident. "Meanwhile, Waitematā detectives travelled to Christchurch to coordinate the arrest of a third male, aged 31, who was also taken into custody." The two men arrested in Auckland, aged 17 and 62, have been charged with murder, appearing in the Waitākere District Court today. The 31-year-old has also been charged with murder and is appearing in the Christchurch District Court today. Mr Curle was located with serious injuries on Kaipara Coast Highway just after midnight on 6 November 2023. He sadly died on 26 November as a result of his injuries. "Police are continuing to provide support to Mr Curle's family at this difficult time," Acting Detective Inspector Williams says. "While we hope these arrests bring closure to both his whānau and the community, our investigation remains ongoing. "We cannot rule out further arrests or charges as our enquiries continue." Police continue to appeal to the public for any information which may assist us with our enquiries. This can be provided via our 105 phone service our 105 or online at [https://www.police.govt.nz/use-105](https://www.police.govt.nz/use-105), using Update My Report. Please reference file number 231106/4405. Information can also be provided anonymously via Crime Stoppers on 0800 555 111. [here](/nz-police-arrest-more-suspects-in-helensville-1166359/).

author: 小浪财讯
title: 沪深300价值ETF（159510）跌0.98%，半日成交额61.12万元|沪深300_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘，沪深300价值ETF（159510）跌0.98%，报1.106元，成交额61.12万元。沪深300价值ETF（159510）重仓股方面， 贵州茅台 截止午盘涨0.00%， 宁德时代 跌1.13%， 中国平安 跌0.93%， 招商银行 跌0.70%， 美的集团 跌0.65%， 兴业银行 跌0.08%， 长江电力 跌0.33%， 格力电器 跌0.63%， 紫金矿业 跌1.44%， 立讯精密 跌0.58%。
沪深300价值ETF（159510）业绩比较基准为中证智选300价值稳健策略指数收益率，管理人为华夏基金管理有限公司，基金经理为赵宗庭，成立（2023-07-31）以来回报为11.67%，近一个月回报为-0.04%。

author: Sergio Velasquez
title: This Solitaire Game Is Taking the App Store by Storm
text:
This Solitaire Game Is Taking the App Store by Storm
Toggle Dark Mode
Every now and then, you’ll find a new game that’s completely dominating the internet. Sometimes, there’s a really fun and addictive game everyone wants to play.
We recently saw it with Wordle, and it’s happening all over again. However, this game can potentially reward you for playing it. That’s right; you can even make some money if you’re skillful enough.
We’re talking, of course, about Solitaire Clash. Yes, we know what you’re thinking: how can a solitaire game be that fun? Bear with us; we’ll show you everything you need to know.
Solitaire Clash: The Game You Need to Play Right Now
Solitaire Clash is a simple but addictive game. As you can guess by its name, you’ll be playing a game of solitaire, but there’s more than meets the eye. If you’ve never played solitaire before, don’t worry; the game does a pretty good job explaining what you need to do. It’s easy to play but difficult to master.
As it turns out, there are a few differences that make this game as addictive as it is.
One of the biggest differences here is that you’ll be racing against the clock. The faster you finish the game, the higher your score will be.
There’s also another fun twist: you won’t be playing by yourself. This is a multiplayer game, so you’ll compete with other players around the world to come out on top.
Plus, if you really want to test your skills, the game has multiplayer tournaments, in which you’ll play different game modes against five or ten other players to rank as high as possible.
If you manage to be one of the top three players, you’ll be able to choose your price, which, as we mentioned before, includes real-life cash.
Can You Really Make Money With Solitaire Clash?
The short answer is yes, but don’t think about quitting your job to become a professional Solitaire player.
Solitaire Clash lets you earn real-life money and transfer it to your PayPal account. The game also works with other platforms like Apple Pay, Visa, Mastercard, American Express, and Venmo, so cashing out is pretty easy and you know transferring your money will be secure and quick.
Your prize pool will depend on the tournament you’re playing. Sure, you can find big prize pools, but keep in mind that the bigger the prize, the more people will try to get in. You’ll need to really bring your A-Game if you want to succeed.
Of course, that’s easier said than done. You’ll also need to earn gems in order to participate in these tournaments, although you can skip the gems and enter your own cash to play. Think of it as a virtual casino.
And for people in specific states that don’t allow cash games, don’t worry. According to Solitaire Clash, you can still play this game even if you’re in states like Arizona, South Carolina, or Vermont.
You will, however, need to be at least 18 years old to play.
What Else Makes Solitaire Clash Great?
If earning actual money just for playing a game isn’t enough for you, Solitaire Clash also comes with some fun features.
Besides the fact that Solitaire is already a pretty addictive game, this game also features special events. For instance, seasonal events like “Hallo-Scream” during late October let you undertake specific Halloween activities to earn gems and, of course, money, and recent holiday-themed events included a
Christmas Sudoku and Passport Puzzler.
It’s also worth mentioning that this is a free-to-download game that features no ads. Unlike most free games on the App Store, you won’t be bothered by annoying pop-up ads after every match. So, even if you don’t care about the money, you can still play Solitaire Clash to have some fun without worrying about ads getting in your face.
Make Money While Playing Solitaire
Whether you love card games or making money on the side, Solitaire Clash is for everyone. You can have tons of fun playing by yourself or against other players around the world.
Or you can see how far you can get in the in-game tournaments to really test your skills.
Whatever you want to do, you can download
Solitare Clash and play it for free. Try the game without spending any money, and maybe you’ll even make some money while you’re at it.
